text: Happy birthday, Solange Knowles! The singer - songwriter turned 31 on Saturday and to celebrate her big day, her mother, Tina Knowles, took to social media to wish her ` ` baby girl'' a very happy birthday. RELATED : Solange Knowles Recalls Growing Up With Beyonce and What It Was Like Being a Teen Mom'' Happy Birthday my beautiful baby,'' Knowles began her Instagram post. ` ` 31 years ago today you entered this world ( when YOU got good and damned ready to come )! 10 days late! We were all in love!!! You've been walking to the beat of your own drum ever since!! I don't know anyone who is as headstrong and determined to do it their way, no matter the consequences
